/*programmed by dipjal */

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#define pb push_back
#define sz(c) c.size()
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;

#define mod 1000000007

static inline ll scan2()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}

static inline int scan1()
{
    int x=0;

    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}


static inline void WriteInt(long long int x)
{
    char s[15];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    l--;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l]);
        l--;
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
}



int main()
{
 ll N;
 ll K;
 ll x;
 ll i;
 set<ll> s;
 N=scan2();
 K=scan2();
 for(i=1;i<=N;i++)
 {
     x=scan2();
     s.insert(x);
 }
 ll cnt=0;
 for(set<ll>::iterator it=s.begin();it!=s.end();it++)
 {
  int y=(*it);
  if(y<K&&y&1)
        cnt++;

 }
 WriteInt(cnt);
 s.clear();
 return 0;
}
